entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
